mapper.insert: REPLACE INTO partial_bom_set( model_id, level, partial_id, quantity) VALUES(#{model_id},#{level},#{partial_id},#{quantity})
mapper.select: SELECT pbm.model_id, pbm.partial_id, ppb.new_partial_id FROM partial_bom_set pbm JOIN partial_position_belong ppb ON pbm.model_id = ppb.model_id AND pbm.partial_id = ppb.partial_id WHERE ppb.history_limit_date<CURDATE() AND ppb.new_partial_id <> ppb.partial_id

SELECT pbm.model_id, pbm.partial_id FROM partial_bom_set pbm JOIN partial_position_belong ppb ON pbm.model_id = ppb.model_id AND pbm.partial_id = ppb.partial_id WHERE ppb.history_limit_date<CURDATE() AND ppb.new_partial_id = ppb.partial_id
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM partial_bom_set WHERE model_id=#{model_id} AND partial_id=#{partial_id}
